QAData.question: Who won between Crystal Palace and Everton on Sun, 12 Dec 2021 16:30:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Crystal Palace won 3–1 over Everton on Sun, 12 Dec 2021 16:30:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Seamus Coleman made an error that led to a goal for Crystal Palace.
James Tomkins completed the most passes (58) in the match.
James Tomkins is the most accurate passer (98%) in the match.
Jordan Ayew lost the most duels (14) in the match.
Andros Townsend is the most fouled player in the match (5 times).
André Gomes has the least touches (41) of any outfield player.
Demarai Gray completed the most dribbles (6) in the match.
Demarai Gray made an error that led to a goal for Crystal Palace.
Conor Gallagher was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.3.
